* Certain tokens are not yet supported by Hemiâ€™s native Tunnel.&#x20;

***

## ğŸ”„ Why Use a Third-Party Bridge?

Hemiâ€™s native Tunnel supports a range of popular ERC-20 tokens. However, some assets (e.g., USDC, USDT) are not yet integrated. In these cases, a third-party bridge provides:

â€¢ Fast bridging times.

â€¢ Established track record of security and reliability.

â€¢ Wide token support, including stablecoins like USDC and USDT.

***

## ğŸ¤ Supported Third-Party Bridges

Below is a list of third-party bridges you can use to transfer assets to Hemi. Each bridge has its own UI, fees, and specific token support.&#x20;

### Stargate

[https://stargate.finance/bridge](https://stargate.finance/bridge)

Supported Assets: USDC, USDT, ETH
